get_services.Description: Return a list of hed services commands with descriptions

dictionary_to_long.Description: Convert a BIDS JSON sidecar (in string form) to short form if valid, otherwise return errors

dictionary_to_short.Description: Convert a BIDS JSON sidecar (in string form) to short form if valid, otherwise return errors

dictionary_validate.Description: Validate a BIDS JSON sidecar (in string form) and return errors

events_assemble.Name: events_assemble
events_assemble.Description: Validate a BIDS events file with JSON sidecars (passed as strings)

events_validate.Name: events_validate
events_validate.Description: Validate a BIDS events file with JSON sidecars (passed as strings)

spreadsheet_validate.Description: Validate a spreadsheet (tsv string) with HED tags in specified columns

strings_validate.Description: Validate a list of HED strings and return errors

meanings.events_string: A BIDS events file as a string
meanings.hed_columns: A list of column numbers (starting with 1) of columns containing HED strings. If empty, all columns are used.
meanings.hed_schema_string: HED XML schema as a string
meanings.hed_strings: List of HED strings to be processed
meanings.hed_version: Version of HED to used in processing
meanings.json_strings: A list of BIDS JSON sidecars as strings
meanings.spreadsheet_string: A spreadsheet tsv as a string

returns.error_type: Type of error if the service failed
returns.error_msg: Explanation of the message if the service failed

results.command: The command that was executed in response to the service request
results.data: The data returned by the service. This could be a list of errors or the processed result depending on what happened.
results.hed_version: The version of the HED schema used in the processing
results.msg_category: One of success, warning, or failure depending on the result of processing the service.
results.msg: Explanation of the result of service processing.
